name: Moon Jump (shoze, robneubauer, maxletraxle)
description:
Made for the #GitHubGameOff !

Jump to nudge your moon and follow the arrow on the map to reach a portal to the next galaxy.
Don't dilly-dally or else you'll run out of star energy!

Keyboard:

  • WASD | Arrow-keys : MOVE
  • Space | Z : JUMP
  • Escape : PAUSE

Controller:

  • Left-stick : MOVE
  • Cross  | A : JUMP
  • Start : PAUSE

Credits:

Art - Galit "shoze" Weisberg

Programming - Max Himmel

Sound - Rob Neubauer
